One of the best puzzle games ever made. It's funny, creative, beautiful and immersive. That would be enough to recommend it normally, but then there's also a coop campaign with tons of unique puzzles too!

If you've never played Portal 2 and love puzzle games, you should def give it a shot. You won't be disappointed. 

Did I even mention the game has a puzzle designer??? You can play community puzzles endlessly!
One of the best Valve series ever. But I think the first portal is better.

This game is actually really fun, so many puzzles to work with, and workshop maps, I'm going to learn speedrunning, see you soon!
Literally THE best logic game ever created. It has everything: fantastic and innovative gameplay,  great plot, top voice acting and engaging multi. Must play for everyone, especially on sale.
i recommend you to play all the half-life games first, but if you don't care much about the story I recommended you to play this game.
It is a very fun game, and has amazing characters!

Un juegazo. Puzles muy ingeniosos, una campa√±a interesante y los entretenidos comentarios que te acompa√±an durante la partida hacen de este juego una experiencia inolvidable. Adem√°s, tiene la ventaja de contar con una campa√±a espec√≠fica para cooperativo, que te da la oportunidad de vivir una experiencia refrescante respecto a la historia en solitario. 
Totalmente recomendable, cada evento de ofertas sale a menos de 2 euros y es, sin duda, una adquisici√≥n obligatoria para cada cuenta de Steam que se precie.

!!!SPOILERS AHEAD, BE WARNED!!!

This game is absolutely a fun experience - Coming back to the test chambers with Wheatley by your side, GlaDOS waking up and subjecting you to the same rodeo as last time, her even getting stuffed into a potato makes this game quite a fun one. 

Don't forget the multiplayer, which is some of the most fun I've had with friends. 100% recommend.

Tak polecam jest bardzo dobra. Gdy rozwiƒÖ≈ºe siƒô jakƒÖ≈õ zagadkƒô czuje siƒô uczucie spe≈Çnienia. Fabu≈ÇƒÖ bardzo ciekawa, z przynajmniej 1 zwrotem akcji. Bardzo polecam.

Wah. Entahlah, agak sulit mendeskripsikannya. Saat pertama memainkannya memang mudah dan menyenangkan, tetapi di tengah mulai menyebalkan dan berharap cepat selesai karena kesulitannya. Namun di di akhir menjadi kembali menyenangkan dan sama seperti Portal 1, entah bagaimana kesan emosional akan pertemuan dan perpisahan muncul kembali, padahal cerita lengkapnya saya belum paham dan gamenya hanya beberapa jam hahaha. Jadi, game ini cocok untuk Anda yang suka puzzle, FPS, suka tantangan yang meminta mikir. Kurang cocok untuk Anda yang tergesa-gesa ingin menyelesaikan game, apalagi yang porsi ceritanya seperti cut scennya sedikit.

Catatan: Direkomendasikan untuk menyelesaikan single player tanpa melihat walkthrough, kepuasan yang didapat akan murni hehe.
nice game must use 100% brain to play
